page.title: 04WHY I MOVED TO CHRISTCHURCH
page.content: My family moved down here because of my Dad's job.He works for Abbey Life. We used to live in Surrey in Walton- on-Thames.My Dad worked in London before but now he works in Bournemouth.He used to travel by train.We have lived here for nine years and are glad to be here;we would never go back.Bransgore is the name of the place I live now;it is quite a large village although boring for people around twelve years and over.I go to Twynham Comprehensive School in Christchurch.It is about four miles from Bransgore.I travel by bus to get there every day.Christchurch is a better place to live because it has more shops and play areas.It is near the sea and the New Forest.Where I used to live I was miles from the sea.
